output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" and includes the hashtag "#MarcelCiolacupreședinte", who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 on the official list).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses inclusive language ("Maramureșenii", "românilor") - Has significant reach (35,000-39,999 impressions)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu for president - Uses campaign slogans (#caleasigurăpentruRomânia) - Makes electoral promises about economic development and quality of life - Clearly aims to influence voting behavior
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Makes promises and promotes a candidate rather than informing
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (PSD Maramureș) - Contains formal campaign messaging and promises

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes campaign promises - Is paid advertising reaching a large audience - Uses official party channels and messaging - Contains campaign hashtags and slogans
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Maramureș, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 3855023434716826) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul promoveaza explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU pentru functia de presedinte, contine numar CMF (11240017), foloseste hashtag-uri de campanie (#MarcelCiolacupreședinte), face promisiuni electorale si este distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram cu un reach estimat intre 35.000-39.999 impresii. Materialul reprezinta propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7) prin referirea directa la candidat, obiectivul electoral explicit si adresarea catre publicul larg.
